member.name: T:Sethealth.Client
member.summary: Client exposes the public api for sethealth.

member.name: M:Sethealth.Client.#ctor
member.summary: Creates a new instance of Client for the server sethealth API It will automatically get the Sethealth credentials from the "SETHEALTH_KEY" and "SETHEALTH_SECRET" environment variables.

member.name: M:Sethealth.Client.#ctor(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new client for the server sethealth API with the key and secret specified.

member.name: P:Sethealth.Client.key
member.summary: Sethealth's API key.

member.name: P:Sethealth.Client.secret
member.summary: Sethealth's API secret.

member.name: M:Sethealth.Client.GetToken
member.summary: This method creates a new short-living token to be used by client side.
member.returns: A GetTokenResponse instance that contains the new token created.

member.name: M:Sethealth.Client.GetToken(Sethealth.GetTokenOptions)
member.summary: This method creates a new short-living token to be used by client side with the options specified.
member.returns: A GetTokenResponse instance that contains the new token created.

member.name: T:Sethealth.GetTokenOptions
member.summary: GetTokenOptions contains options to create the token.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenOptions.userId
member.summary: User's ID.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenOptions.expiresIn
member.summary: Token duration in nanoseconds.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenOptions.testMode
member.summary: If true, It would access to test server.

member.name: M:Sethealth.GetTokenOptions.#ctor(System.String,System.Int64,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Creates new instance with the options needed in order to get a token.
member.param: If true, It would access to test server.

member.name: T:Sethealth.GetTokenRequestOptions
member.summary: GetTokenOptions contains options sent in the request to create the token.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenRequestOptions.id
member.summary: Sethealth's API key.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenRequestOptions.secret
member.summary: Sethealth's API secret.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenRequestOptions.userId
member.summary: User's ID.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenRequestOptions.expiresIn
member.summary: Token duration in nanoseconds.

member.name: P:Sethealth.GetTokenRequestOptions.testMode
member.summary: If true, It would access to test server.

member.name: T:Sethealth.GetTokenResponse
member.summary: GetTokenResponse contains the result values of calling the GetToken() API.

member.name: F:Sethealth.GetTokenResponse.token
member.summary: Sethealth's token string
